summary: A utility class that defines a framework for modifying model logits in Flax-based generation pipelines, allowing custom transformations such as scaling, filtering, or biasing of probability distributions before token selection.
business_intent: Provide a flexible, reusable component for adjusting output probabilities of Flax models to support diverse generation strategies (e.g., temperature scaling, top‑k/top‑p filtering) and improve downstream text generation quality.
